transform: <xsl:stylesheet version="3.0" xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" xmlns:fn="http://www.w3.org/2005/02/xpath-functions"><xsl:output method="text" indent="yes" encoding="utf-8"/><xsl:template match="/">{ "Count": <xsl:value-of select="/node()/total-item-count"/>, "Documents" : [<xsl:for-each select="/node()/result-sections/result-section/search-results/search-result">{ "Title": "<xsl:value-of select="./document-title" />", "webURL" : "<xsl:for-each select="./document-url-list/document-url[@name='Document Link']"><xsl:value-of select="./@url" /></xsl:for-each>", "Type": "<xsl:value-of select="./document-content-type" />",  "CreationDate": "<xsl:for-each select="./document-abstract/value[@name='date']"><xsl:value-of select="./text()" /></xsl:for-each>", "Snippet": "<xsl:for-each select="./document-abstract/value[@name='summary']"><xsl:value-of select="translate(./text(),'\"','')" /></xsl:for-each>", "AdditionalProperties": { "document-guid": "<xsl:value-of select="./document-guid" />" }}<xsl:if test="position() != last()">,</xsl:if></xsl:for-each>] }</xsl:template></xsl:stylesheet>
